Segment.name: RDR
Segment.comment: To indicate the disposition of the item, the reason for return by the returnee, the response to the reason for return, and whether the item was used

Field.name: ReturnsDispositionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the disposition of a contested item

Field.name: ReturnRequestReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the reason for the return from the party returning, or requesting to return, the items

Field.name: ReturnResponseReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the response to a request to return items

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
